name: Vegetable Biryani
recipe: Vegetable biryani is a fragrant and flavorful rice dish made with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices.

name: Aloo Gobi
recipe: Aloo gobi is a classic North Indian dish made with potatoes and cauliflower in a spiced tomato gravy.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipe: Chicken tikka masala is a creamy and flavorful curry made with marinated chicken pieces.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
recipe: Mutton rogan josh is a rich and spicy Kashmiri curry made with tender pieces of mutton.

name: Fish Curry
recipe: Fish curry is a tangy and spicy South Indian dish made with fresh fish and coconut milk.
